directions: Saute onions, garlic, and ginger in olive oil for 15 minutes or so. Then add in mustard seeds, green pepper and potatoes and saute a couple minutes. Add in vegetable stock, coconut milk and spices and let simmer for 20 minutes. Then, add in cashews and let cook another five minutes.
Garnish with parsley and cashews - enjoy with rice or naan.
ingredients: 1 (1 inch) piece fresh ginger root, peeled and chopped
title: Sri Lankan Potato & Cashew Curry
